entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
